offset: v.toggle1 = 0; v.toggle2 = 1; v.toggle3 = 0; v.spawn6_loc_x = (math.floor(query.position(0)/16)*16) + v.off_pos_x; return 0;

minecraft:particle_lifetime_expression.expiration_expression: v.toggle_action = query.is_item_name_any('slot.weapon.offhand', 0, 'minecraft:firework_rocket', 'minecraft:nautilus_shell') && query.is_item_name_any('slot.weapon.mainhand', 0, 'minecraft:firework_rocket', 'minecraft:nautilus_shell'); v.toggle1 = v.toggle_action && !v.toggle3 ? 1 : 0; v.toggle2 = v.toggle1 && !v.toggle2 ? 1 : (v.toggle1 && v.toggle2 ? 0 : v.toggle2); v.toggle3 = v.toggle_action ? 1 : 0; return v.source == 'player' ? v.toggle2 : ((query.effect_particle_count > v.p_cap && v.particle_age > 1) || (query.distance_from_camera < 32 && !query.is_item_name_any('slot.weapon.mainhand', 0, 'minecraft:acacia_planks', 'minecraft:bamboo_planks', 'minecraft:birch_planks', 'minecraft:cherry_planks', 'minecraft:crimson_planks', 'minecraft:dark_oak_planks', 'minecraft:jungle_planks', 'minecraft:mangrove_planks', 'minecraft:oak_planks', 'minecraft:spruce_planks', 'minecraft:warped_planks')));
